name: Simulate Metabolic Network Perturbation
description: Construct and simulate kinetic models of metabolic networks and analyze their responses to perturbations
install: cd /tmp && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni.git biomni_repo && cd biomni_repo && pip install -e . && pip install cobra numpy scipy pandas

inputs.name: MODEL_FILE
inputs.description: Path to the COBRA model file (SBML format)

inputs.name: INITIAL_CONCENTRATIONS
inputs.description: JSON dictionary mapping metabolite IDs to their initial concentrations (format: {"glc__D_e": 10.0})

inputs.name: PERTURBATION_PARAMS
inputs.description: JSON dictionary with perturbation parameters: time, metabolite, and factor (format: {"time": 50, "metabolite": "glc__D_e", "factor": 2.0})

inputs.name: TIME_POINTS
inputs.description: Number of time points to simulate
